attributes.action: GCSE's and A-levels to be done on computers
attributes.additional_details: My parents told me that everything they do for their business is computerised and the only written work they do is to make notes from skype calls.
attributes.background: I believe that GCSE's and A-levels should be done on the computer because in the workplace today the only writing that humans do is notes for themselves as everything is done on computers.

rejection.details: This would be the responsibility of exam boards, not the UK Government or Parliament.
